item.description:
(updated, Friday, June 24)

Dinner will be at the Border Cafe, 32 Church Street, Harvard Square.

If you will be joing us for dinner, please write "dinner" in your RSVP comments so I know who to expect for dinner.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Directed by John Huston, African Queen came out in 1951 starring the block busting due of Humpregy Bogart and Katharine Hepburn. It does not get much better than this! Enough said.

  I'll be setting up a pre-dinner somewhere in the square about 5:15 (please answer the RSVP quesitons).

If you will not be joining us for dinner, look for us in the theater's lobby about 7:00. I'll be wearing a Harvard baseball cap looking down at my smart phone trying to identify late comers by their photos on the MeetUp list.

The movie starts right at 7:15, there are no previews. At 7:15 I'll turn off my phone and go into the theater. I prefer the balcony. 

If you arrive late look for us afterwards, outside the right side exit door. Depending on interest, we can go somewhere afterwards for tea or drinks
item.how_to_find_us: Your best bet for finding us is to arrive early and look for us in the theater lobby. I'll be wearing a Harvard baseball cap.
item.name: African Queen
